thread.title: Two 17-year-old boys found dead at bottom of cliffs in Teesside
thread.title_full: Two 17-year-old boys found dead at bottom of cliffs in Teesside

author: Richard Wheatstone
title: Two 17-year-old boys found dead at bottom of cliffs in Teesside
text:
The boys were found at the bottom of Huntcliff in Saltburn (Photo: Robert Harding World Imagery) Share Get daily     
Two 17-year-old boys have been found dead at the bottom of cliffs in Teesside. 
The boys' bodies were found at the bottom of Huntcliff in Saltburn at around 7pm last night. 
Police are now investigating their deaths and appealing for witnesses to come forward. 
A spokesperson for Cleveland Police said : â€œThe families of the boys are being supported by specialist officers and our thoughts remain with them at this difficult time. 
Any witnesses who may have been in the area of Huntcliff around the time of the incident are asked to contact Detective Sergeant Paul Hodgson from Cleveland Police Major Crime Team on the non-emergency number 101. Read More 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
